Articles.Content:
**IR for 1.3 / KJR issues**

List of IR download files to work with KSP 1.3

**Remove "Active struts" as well as "strut" Folders" they are currently incompatible with KSP 1.3 - Unless you opt to use the unofficial Recompiled .dll linked below**

Steps to install Infernal Robotics

1) Install Core Download which is the plugin and "core Files" of IR  (No parts are in this download)

2) Install Parts Pack (Legacy is the original parts, and Rework are the new white parts. You can have both installed if you wish)

3) Remove folders "IRActiveStruts" and "Struts" as they are currently incompatible

4) **Optional** -  If you wish to use the Surface sampler - Install the Surfacesampler.dll linked below into GameData/MagicSmokeIndustries/Parts/Rework\_Utility/Plugins

5) **Optional**  - KJR unofficial recompile will work with KSP 1.3 and IR 2.0.12 - Linked below

6) **Optional** - <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> Magnet / Grasper Breaking? Increase "breakForce" under the <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> module in the part cfg to "= 999"

7) **Optional** - Unofficial recompile of Active Struts Plugin linked below. Curtesy of Whale\_2

**Core Download**

Infernal Robotics (Ziw) 2.0.12

[<font color="#0066cc">https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases</font>](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases)

**Parts / Plugin**

Legacy Parts (Ziw)

[<u><font color="#0066cc">https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/download/2.0.0/IR-LegacyParts.zip</font></u>](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/InfernalRobotics/releases/download/2.0.0/IR-LegacyParts.zip)

IR Rework Parts (Zodiusinfuser) **<font color="#e74c3c">- See Active Struts notes above</font>**

[<u><font color="#0066cc">https://mega.nz/#!rdlHkLAJ!ZizDvd8s7zCIG529FtO8b7wM0avJ8yC3pldIaf6BGFw</font></u>](https://mega.nz/#!rdlHkLAJ!ZizDvd8s7zCIG529FtO8b7wM0avJ8yC3pldIaf6BGFw) **** 

Surface Sampler dll (DMagic) **- Place into "MagicSmokeIndustries/Parts/Rework\_Utility/Plugins"**

[<font color="#0066cc">https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-Surface-Sampler/tree/master/GameData/MagicSmokeIndustries/Parts/Rework_Utility/Plugins</font>](https://github.com/MagicSmokeIndustries/IR-Surface-Sampler/tree/master/GameData/MagicSmokeIndustries/Parts/Rework_Utility/Plugins)

Active Struts Plugin Unofficial Recompile (Whale\_2)

[https://github.com/whale2/Active-Struts/releases/tag/1.1.0-1](https://github.com/whale2/Active-Struts/releases/tag/1.1.0-1)

**Utility**

Thread Link For IR Sequencer (Ziw) 

<iframe data-embedcontent="" frameborder="0" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/104547-13-ir-sequencer-v103-add-on-to-infernal-robotics-updated-05062017/&do=embed&comment=3080938&embedComment=3080938&embedDo=findComment"></iframe>

**Kerbal Joint Reinforcement**

Official GitHub Repository (Ferram4) - [<font color="#0066cc">https://github.com/ferram4/Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement/releases</font>](https://github.com/ferram4/Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement/releases)

Unofficial Recompile For 1.3 (siimav) - [<font color="#0066cc">https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxowaRaYHkjddHc2T28zWEdLcjQ/view</font>](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxowaRaYHkjddHc2T28zWEdLcjQ/view)

Please feel free to repost / update this list every so often to help a lot of the new comers

Im not familiar with <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">ckan</abbr>, i can only recommend doing it manually.

No, there is no official release for KSP 1.3. Even in 1.2.x. it was unofficial BETA release all the way.

There is instructions couple of pages back how to download and install everything manually. Once it comes out from BETA it will be available trough <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr>, but also it can happen that another KSP release updates sooner, so nothing is certain.
